bodyText: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
name: Sneezy - Noisy Knight
bodyText: Headwind: When you play this character, chosen knight character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2{s} when challenging.)

franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
name: Dopey - Knight Apprentice
bodyText: Stronger Together: When you play this character, if you have another Knight character in play, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character or location.

name: Namaari - Resolute Daughter
bodyText:
I Don't Have Any Other Choice: For each opposing character banished in a challenge this turn, you pay 2{i} less to play this character.
Resist +3 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 3.)

franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
name: Snow White - Fair-hearted
flavorText: Friendship is the best armor of all.
bodyText: Natural Leader: This character gains Resist +1 for each other Knight character you have in play. (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1 for each other Knight.)

name: Yzma - Unjustly Treated
flavorText: "What do you mean, 'not on the list'?! I told you to always put me on the list!"
bodyText: I'm Warning You!: During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes a character in a challenge, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

name: Kronk - Head of Security
bodyText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Kronk.)
Are You on the List?: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may play a character with cost 5 or less for free.

franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
name: Grumpy - Skeptical Knight
bodyText:
Boon of Resilience: While one of your Knight characters is at a location, that character gains Resist +2. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)
Burst of Speed: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Pete - Wrestling Champ
flavorText: He'll have you seeing double.
bodyText: Re-Pete: {e} - Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card named Pete, you may play it for free.

name: Sir Ector - Castle Lord
flavorText: "Well, by Jove. Don't just stand there. Raise a glass to my son Kay . . . and may we be rid of the trickster wizard Marvin, or whatever his blasted name was."

franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
name: Bashful - Adoring Knight
bodyText: Impress the Princess: While you have a character named Snow White in play, this character gains Bodyguard. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

name: Arthur - Wart
flavorText:
"That boy's got real spark. Lots of spirit. Throws himself heart and soul into everything he does."
-Merlin

franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
name: Happy - Lively Knight
bodyText: Burst of Speed: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Simba - Son of Mufasa
bodyText:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Simba.)
Fearsome Roar: When you play this character, you may banish chosen item or location.

franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
name: Doc - Bold Knight
bodyText: Drastic Measures: When you play this character, you may discard your hand to draw 2 cards.

name: Arthur - King Victorius
bodyText: Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Arthur.) Knighted by the King: When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Resist +2 and can challenge ready characters this turn. (They get +2{s} while challenging. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

name: Pete - Games Referee
flavorText: "It ain't cheatin' if you're the one makin' the rules."
bodyText: Blow the Whistle: When you play this character, opponents can't play actions until the start of your next turn.

name: Tug-Of-War
bodyText:
Choose one:
- Deal 1 damage to each opposing character without Evasive.
- Deal 3 damage to each opposing character with Evasive.

name: When Will My Life Begin?
flavorText: Stuck in the same place I've always been.
bodyText:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character can't challenge during their next turn. Draw a card.

name: Duck For Cover!
bodyText: Chosen character gains Resist +1 and Evasive this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1. They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Food Fight!
flavorText: "Gawrsh, who ordered the . . . upside-down CAA-AA-AKE?"
bodyText: Your characters gain "{e}, 1{i} - Deal 1 damage to chosen character" this turn.

name: Shield of Arendelle
bodyText: Deflect: Banish this item - Chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

name: Plate Armor
bodyText: Well Crafted: {e} - Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

name: Steel Chromicon
flavorText:
"Strong in will, strong in battle."
-Inscription
bodyText: Steel Light: {e} - Deal 1 damage to chosen character.

name: Bad-Anon - Villain Support Center
bodyText: There's No One I'd Rather Be Than Me: Villain characters gain "{e}, 3{i} - Play a character with the same name as this character for free" while here.

franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
name: Seven Dwarfs' Mine - Secure Fortress
bodyText: Mountain Defense: During your turn, the first time you move a character here, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character. If the moved character is a Knight, deal 2 damage instead.
